h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: If you head to the end of the cells, you'll find a green Wisp to absorb, and a ledge outside leading back down to a small outcropping below with a second green Wisp, and a one-way drop back to the very start (we'd recommend grabbing the next Shrine at the top of the stairs to Level 3 first).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)'.
The content is as follows:
If you head to the end of the cells, you'll find a green Wisp to absorb, and a ledge outside leading back down to a small outcropping below with a second green Wisp, and a one-way drop back to the very start (we'd recommend grabbing the next Shrine at the top of the stairs to Level 3 first).
